result.eng: I had to pay the money.
result.ga: bhí orm an t-airgead a íoc
result.orig: bhí orm an t-airgead a íoc
result.html: bhí orm an t-airgead a íocI had to pay the money.
result.ponchtml: ḃí orm an t-airgead a íocI had to pay the money.

result.eng: Can I pay with a credit card?
result.ga: an féidir liom íoc le cárta creidmheasa
result.orig: an féidir liom íoc le cárta creidmheasa
result.html: an féidir liom íoc le cárta creidmheasaCan I pay with a credit card?
result.ponchtml: an féidir liom íoc le cárta creidṁeasaCan I pay with a credit card?

result.eng: The money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.
result.ga: an t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiú
result.orig: an t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiú
result.html: an t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiúThe money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.
result.ponchtml: an t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfaḋ sé an cíos dom fiúThe money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.

result.eng: Did you pay the full price?
result.ga: ar íoc tú an praghas iomlán
result.orig: ar íoc tú an praghas iomlán
result.html: ar íoc tú an praghas iomlánDid you pay the full price?
result.ponchtml: ar íoc tú an praġas iomlánDid you pay the full price?

result.eng: You will have to pay for parking on the side of the street.
result.ga: beidh ort íoc as páirceáil ar thaobh na sráide
result.orig: beidh ort íoc as páirceáil ar thaobh na sráide
result.html: beidh ort íoc as páirceáil ar thaobh na sráideYou will have to pay for parking on the side of the street.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ ort íoc as páirceáil ar ṫaoḃ na sráideYou will have to pay for parking on the side of the street.

result.eng: We will have to pay the funeral costs.
result.ga: beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íoc
result.orig: beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íoc
result.html: beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íocWe will have to pay the funeral costs.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ orainn costas na soċraide a íocWe will have to pay the funeral costs.

result.eng: You have to pay a fee for the service.
result.ga: caithfidh tú táille a íoc as an tseirbhís
result.orig: caithfidh tú táille a íoc as an tseirbhís
result.html: caithfidh tú táille a íoc as an tseirbhísYou have to pay a fee for the service.
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ tú táille a íoc as an tseirḃísYou have to pay a fee for the service.

result.eng: Whoever did it, he will pay for it.
result.ga: cibé duine a rinne é íocfaidh sé as
result.orig: cibé duine a rinne é íocfaidh sé as
result.html: cibé duine a rinne é íocfaidh sé asWhoever did it, he will pay for it.
result.ponchtml: cibé duine a rinne é íocfaiḋ sé asWhoever did it, he will pay for it.

result.eng: How much did you pay?
result.ga: cá mhéad a d'íoc tú
result.orig: cá mhéad a d'íoc tú
result.html: cá mhéad a d'íoc túHow much did you pay?
result.ponchtml: cá ṁéad a d'íoc túHow much did you pay?

result.eng: Who would pay for such badly made clothes?
result.ga: cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sin
result.orig: cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sin
result.html: cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sinWho would pay for such badly made clothes?
result.ponchtml: cé a d'íocfaḋ airgead ar éadaí a ḃí déanta ċoṁ dona sinWho would pay for such badly made clothes?

result.eng: Wait until pay day.
result.ga: fan go lá pá
result.orig: fan go lá pá
result.html: fan go lá páWait until pay day.
result.ponchtml: fan go lá páWait until pay day.

result.eng: I am not willing to pay for it.
result.ga: níl mé sásta íoc as
result.orig: níl mé sásta íoc as
result.html: níl mé sásta íoc asI am not willing to pay for it.
result.ponchtml: níl mé sásta íoc asI am not willing to pay for it.

result.eng: You don't have to pay me the twenty pounds back.
result.ga: níl ort an fiche punt sin a íoc ar ais liom
result.orig: níl ort an fiche punt sin a íoc ar ais liom
result.html: níl ort an fiche punt sin a íoc ar ais liomYou don't have to pay me the twenty pounds back.
result.ponchtml: níl ort an fiċe punt sin a íoc ar ais liomYou don't have to pay me the twenty pounds back.

result.eng: I didn't pay much attention to it.
result.ga: níor thug mé mórán airde air
result.orig: níor thug mé mórán airde air
result.html: níor thug mé mórán airde airI didn't pay much attention to it.
result.ponchtml: níor ṫug mé mórán airde airI didn't pay much attention to it.

result.eng: He didn't pay the fee.
result.ga: níor íoc sé an táille
result.orig: níor íoc sé an táille
result.html: níor íoc sé an táilleHe didn't pay the fee.
result.ponchtml: níor íoc sé an táilleHe didn't pay the fee.

result.eng: This one of the people who didn't pay the fee.

result.orig: seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táille
result.html: seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táilleThis one of the people who didn't pay the fee.
result.ponchtml: seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táilleThis one of the people who didn't pay the fee.

result.eng: They offered him to pay his travel costs.
result.ga: thairg siad dó a chostais taistil a íoc
result.orig: thairg siad dó a chostais taistil a íoc
result.html: thairg siad dó a chostais taistil a íocThey offered him to pay his travel costs.
result.ponchtml: ṫairg siad dó a ċostais taistil a íocThey offered him to pay his travel costs.

result.eng: Why didn't you pay the fee?
result.ga: tuige nár íoc tú an táille
result.orig: tuige nár íoc tú an táille
result.html: tuige nár íoc tú an táilleWhy didn't you pay the fee?
result.ponchtml: tuige nár íoc tú an táilleWhy didn't you pay the fee?

result.eng: How much do you pay per month?

result.eng: The tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.
result.ga: ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuine
result.orig: ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuine
result.html: ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuineThe tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.
result.ponchtml: ní íocfaiḋ an binse as costais dlí a ṫiteann ar ḋuineThe tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.

result.eng: She was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.
result.ga: dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtas
result.orig: dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtas

result.ponchtml: dúraḋ léi go mbeaḋ uirṫi €500 a íoc leis an rialtasShe was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.

result.eng: Citizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ga: is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.orig: is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.html: is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ponchtml: is maiṫ an coinċeap é iriseoireaċt an tsaoránaiġ aċ i ndeireaḋ ama caiṫfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!

result.eng: Sometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
result.ga: amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugann
